   20: 
   21: -module(rb_SUITE).
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: 
   25: -compile(export_all).
   26: 
   27: -define(SUP,rb_SUITE_sup).
   28: 
   29: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   30: all() ->
   31:     no_group_cases() ++ [{group,running_error_logger}].
   32: 
   33: no_group_cases() ->
   34:     [help,
   35:      start_error_stop].
   36: 
   37: groups() ->
   38:     [{running_error_logger,[shuffle],[show,
   39:                                       show_other,
   40: 				      list,
   41: 				      rescan,
   42: 				      start_stop_log,
   43: 				      grep,
   44: 				      filter_filter,
   45: 				      filter_date,
   46: 				      filter_filter_and_date,
   47: 				      filter_re_no
   48: 				     ]}].
   49: 
   50: 
   51: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   52:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
   53:     RbDir = filename:join(PrivDir,rb),
   54:     ok = file:make_dir(RbDir),
   55:     NewConfig = [{rb_dir,RbDir}|Config],
   56:     reset_sasl(NewConfig),
   57:     NewConfig.
   58: 
   59: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   60:     ok.
   61: 
   62: init_per_group(running_error_logger,Config) ->
   63:     %% Install log_mf_h
   64:     RbDir = ?config(rb_dir,Config),
   65:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_dir,RbDir),
   66:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_maxbytes,5000),
   67:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_maxfiles,2),
   68:     restart_sasl(),
   69:     Config.
   70: 
   71: end_per_group(running_error_logger,_Config) ->
   72:     %% Remove log_mf_h???
   73:     ok.
   74: 
   75: 
   76: init_per_testcase(_Case,Config) ->
   77:     case whereis(?SUP) of
   78: 	undefined ->
   79: 	    ok;
   80: 	Sup ->
   81: 	    Server = whereis(?MODULE),
   82: 	    exit(Sup,kill),
   83: 	    wait_for_down([Server,Sup])
   84:     end,
   85:     empty_error_logs(Config),
   86:     Config.
   87: 
   88: wait_for_down([]) ->
   89:     ok;
   90: wait_for_down([undefined|Rest]) ->
   91:     wait_for_down(Rest);
   92: wait_for_down([Pid|Rest]) ->
   93:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process,Pid),
   94:     receive {'DOWN', Ref, process, Pid, _Info} -> ok end,
   95:     wait_for_down(Rest).
   96: 
   97: end_per_testcase(Case,Config) ->
   98:     try apply(?MODULE,Case,[cleanup,Config])
   99:     catch error:undef -> ok
  100:     end,
  101:     ok.
  102: 
  103: 
  104: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  105: %%% Test cases
  106: 
  107: help(_Config) ->
  108:     Help = capture(fun() -> rb:h() end),
  109:     %% Check that first and last line is there
  110:     true = lists:member("Report Browser Tool - usage", Help),
  111:     true = lists:member("rb:stop            - stop the rb_server", Help),
  112:     ok.
  113: 
  114: %% Test that all three sasl env vars must be set for a successful start of rb
  115: %% Then stop rb.
  116: start_error_stop(Config) ->
  117:     RbDir = ?config(rb_dir,Config),
  118: 
  119:     {error,{"cannot locate report directory",_}} = rb:start(),
  120: 
  121: 
  122:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_dir,"invaliddir"),
  123:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_maxbytes,1000),
  124:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_maxfiles,2),
  125:     restart_sasl(),
  126:     {error,{"cannot read the index file",_}} = rb:start(),
  127:     ok = application:set_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_dir,RbDir),
  128:     restart_sasl(),
  129:     {ok,_} = rb:start(),
  130: 
  131:     ok = rb:stop(),
  132:     ok.
  133: 
  134: show(Config) ->
  135:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  136:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir,"rb_SUITE_log.txt"),
  137: 
  138:     %% Insert some reports in the error log and start rb
  139:     init_error_logs(),
  140:     ok = start_rb(OutFile),
  141: 
  142:     %% Show all reports
  143:     All = check_report(fun() -> rb:show() end,OutFile),
  144: 
  145:     %% Show by number
  146:     [{_,First}] = check_report(fun() -> rb:show(1) end,OutFile),
  147:     {1,First} = lists:keyfind(1,1,All),
  148: 
  149:     %% Show by type
  150:     [{_,CR}] = check_report(fun() -> rb:show(crash_report) end,OutFile),
  151:     true = contains(CR,"rb_test_crash"),
  152:     [{_,EC},{_,EM}] = check_report(fun() -> rb:show(error) end,OutFile),
  153:     true = contains(EC,"rb_test_crash"),
  154:     true = contains(EM,"rb_test_error_msg"),
  155:     [{_,ER}] = check_report(fun() -> rb:show(error_report) end,OutFile),
  156:     true = contains(ER,"rb_test_error"),
  157:     [{_,IR}] = check_report(fun() -> rb:show(info_report) end,OutFile),
  158:     true = contains(IR,"rb_test_info"),
  159:     [{_,IM}] = check_report(fun() -> rb:show(info_msg) end,OutFile),
  160:     true = contains(IM,"rb_test_info_msg"),
  161:     [_|_] = check_report(fun() -> rb:show(progress) end,OutFile),
  162:     [{_,SR}] = check_report(fun() -> rb:show(supervisor_report) end,
  163: 			    OutFile),
  164:     true = contains(SR,"child_terminated"),
  165:     true = contains(SR,"{rb_SUITE,rb_test_crash}"),
  166: 
  167:     ok.
  168: 
  169: show_other(Config) ->
  170:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  171:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir,"rb_SUITE_log.txt"),
  172: 
  173:     %% Insert some reports in the error log and start rb
  174:     error_logger:info_report([rb_test_term_in_list]),
  175:     error_logger:info_report(rb_test_term_no_list),
  176:     ok = start_rb(OutFile),
  177: 
  178:     %% Show by type and check content
  179:     [{_,I1},{_,I2}] = check_report(fun() -> rb:show(info_report) end,OutFile),
  180: 
  181:     true = contains(I1,"rb_test_term_no_list"),
  182:     true = contains(I2,"rb_test_term_in_list"),
  183: 
  184:     ok.
  185: 
  186: list(Config) ->
  187:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  188:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir,"rb_SUITE_log.txt"),
  189: 
  190:     %% Insert some reports in the error log and start rb
  191:     init_error_logs(),
  192:     ok = start_rb(OutFile),
  193: 
  194:     All = capture(fun() -> rb:list() end),
  195:     [{crash_report,[_]=CR},
  196:      {error,[_,_]=EM},
  197:      {error_report,[_]=ER},
  198:      {info_msg,[_]=IM},
  199:      {info_report,[_]=IR},
  200:      {progress,[_|_]=P},
  201:      {supervisor_report,[_]=SR}] = sort_list(All),
  202: 
  203:     [{crash_report,CR}] =
  204: 	sort_list(capture(fun() -> rb:list(crash_report) end)),
  205:     [{error,EM}] =
  206: 	sort_list(capture(fun() -> rb:list(error) end)),
  207:     [{error_report,ER}] =
  208: 	sort_list(capture(fun() -> rb:list(error_report) end)),
  209:     [{info_msg,IM}] =
  210: 	sort_list(capture(fun() -> rb:list(info_msg) end)),
  211:     [{info_report,IR}] =
  212: 	sort_list(capture(fun() -> rb:list(info_report) end)),
  213:     [{progress,P}] =
  214: 	sort_list(capture(fun() -> rb:list(progress) end)),
  215:     [{supervisor_report,SR}] =
  216: 	sort_list(capture(fun() -> rb:list(supervisor_report) end)),
  217: 
  218:     ok.
  219: 
  220: grep(Config) ->
  221:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  222:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir,"rb_SUITE_log.txt"),
  223: 
  224:     %% Insert some reports in the error log and start rb
  225:     init_error_logs(),
  226:     ok = start_rb(OutFile),
  227: 
  228:     [{_,S},
  229:      {_,CR},
  230:      {_,EC},
  231:      {_,IM},
  232:      {_,IR},
  233:      {_,EM},
  234:      {_,ER}]= check_report(fun() -> rb:grep("rb_test_") end,OutFile),
  235:     true = contains(S, "rb_test_crash"),
  236:     true = contains(CR, "rb_test_crash"),
  237:     true = contains(EC, "rb_test_crash"),
  238:     true = contains(IM, "rb_test_info_msg"),
  239:     true = contains(IR, "rb_test_info"),
  240:     true = contains(EM, "rb_test_error_msg"),
  241:     true = contains(ER, "rb_test_error"),
  242:     ok.
  243: 
  244: filter_filter(Config) ->
  245:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  246:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir,"rb_SUITE_log.txt"),
  247: 
  248:     %% Insert some reports in the error log and start rb
  249:     init_error_logs(),
  250:     ok = start_rb(OutFile),
  251: 
  252:     All = check_report(fun() -> rb:show() end,OutFile),
  253: 
  254:     ER = [_] = rb_filter([{rb_SUITE,rb_test_error}],OutFile),
  255:     [] = rb_filter([{rb_SUITE,rb_test}],OutFile),
  256:     _E = [_,_] = rb_filter([{rb_SUITE,"rb_test",re}],OutFile),
  257:     AllButER = rb_filter([{rb_SUITE,rb_test_error,no}],OutFile),
  258: 
  259:     {_,AllRep} = lists:unzip(All),
  260:     {_,ERRep} = lists:unzip(ER),
  261:     {_,AllButERRep} = lists:unzip(AllButER),
  262:     AllButERRep = AllRep -- ERRep,
  263: 
  264:     ok.
  265: 
  266: filter_date(Config) ->
  267:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  268:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir,"rb_SUITE_log.txt"),
  269: 
  270: 
  271:     %% Insert some reports in the error log and start rb
  272:     init_error_logs(),
  273:     Between1 = calendar:local_time(),
  274:     timer:sleep(1000),
  275:     Between2 = calendar:local_time(),
  276:     ok = start_rb(OutFile),
  277: 
  278:     All = check_report(fun() -> rb:show() end,OutFile),
  279: 
  280:     Before = calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(
  281: 	       calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(calendar:local_time()) - 10),
  282:     After = calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(
  283: 	      calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(calendar:local_time()) + 1),
  284: 
  285:     All = rb_filter([],{Before,from},OutFile),
  286:     All = rb_filter([],{After,to},OutFile),
  287:     [] = rb_filter([],{Before,to},OutFile),
  288:     [] = rb_filter([],{After,from},OutFile),
  289:     All = rb_filter([],{Before,After},OutFile),
  290: 
  291:     %%test_server:format("~p~n",[All]),
  292:     AllButLast = [{N-1,R} || {N,R} <- tl(All)],
  293:     AllButLast = rb_filter([],{Before,Between1},OutFile),
  294: 
  295:     Last = hd(All),
  296:     [Last] = rb_filter([],{Between2,After},OutFile),
  297: 
  298:     ok.
  299: 
  300: filter_filter_and_date(Config) ->
  301:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  302:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir,"rb_SUITE_log.txt"),
  303: 
  304: 
  305:     %% Insert some reports in the error log and start rb
  306:     init_error_logs(),
  307:     Between1 = calendar:local_time(),
  308:     timer:sleep(1000),
  309:     Between2 = calendar:local_time(),
  310:     error_logger:error_report([{rb_SUITE,rb_test_filter}]),
  311:     ok = start_rb(OutFile),
  312: 
  313:     Before = calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(
  314: 	       calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(calendar:local_time()) - 10),
  315:     After = calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(
  316: 	      calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(calendar:local_time()) + 1),
  317: 
  318:     All = check_report(fun() -> rb:show() end,OutFile),
  319:     Last = hd(All),
  320: 
  321:     [_,_,_] = rb_filter([{rb_SUITE,"rb_test",re}],{Before,After},OutFile),
  322:     [_,_] = rb_filter([{rb_SUITE,"rb_test",re}],{Before,Between1},OutFile),
  323:     [_] = rb_filter([{rb_SUITE,"rb_test",re}],{Between2,After},OutFile),
  324:     [_] = rb_filter([{rb_SUITE,rb_test_filter}],{Before,After},OutFile),
  325:     [] = rb_filter([{rb_SUITE,rb_test_filter}],{Before,Between1},OutFile),
  326:     [Last] = rb_filter([{rb_SUITE,rb_test_filter,no}],{Between2,After},OutFile),
  327:     {_,Str} = Last,
  328:     false = contains(Str,"rb_test_filter"),
  329: 
  330:     ok.
  331: 
  332: 
  333: filter_re_no(Config) ->
  334:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  335:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir,"rb_SUITE_log.txt"),
  336: 
  337:     %% Insert some reports in the error log and start rb
  338:     init_error_logs(),
  339:     ok = start_rb(OutFile),
  340: 
  341:     All = check_report(fun() -> rb:show() end,OutFile),
  342: 
  343:     E = [_,_] = rb_filter([{rb_SUITE,"rb_test",re}],OutFile),
  344:     AllButE = rb_filter([{rb_SUITE,"rb_test",re,no}],OutFile),
  345: 
  346:     {_,AllRep} = lists:unzip(All),
  347:     {_,ERep} = lists:unzip(E),
  348:     {_,AllButERep} = lists:unzip(AllButE),
  349:     AllButERep = AllRep -- ERep,
  350: 
  351:     ok.
  352: 
  353: 
  354: rescan(Config) ->
  355:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  356:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir,"rb_SUITE_log.txt"),
  357: 
  358:     %% Start rb
  359:     ok = start_rb(OutFile),
  360: 
  361:     %% Insert one more report and check that the list is longer. Note
  362:     %% that there might be two more reports, since the progress report
  363:     %% from starting rb_server might not be included before the rescan.
  364:     AllBefore = capture(fun() -> rb:list() end),
  365:     error_logger:error_report([{rb_SUITE,rb_test_rescan}]),
  366:     ok = rb:rescan(),
  367:     AllAfter = capture(fun() -> rb:list() end),
  368:     Diff = length(AllAfter) - length(AllBefore),
  369:     true = (Diff >= 1),
  370: 
  371:     ok.
  372: 
  373: 
  374: start_stop_log(Config) ->
  375:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  376:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir,"rb_SUITE_log.txt"),
  377:     ok = file:write_file(OutFile,[]),
  378: 
  379:     %% Start rb and check that show is printed to standard_io
  380:     ok = start_rb(),
  381:     StdioResult = [_|_] = capture(fun() -> rb:show(1) end),
  382:     {ok,<<>>} = file:read_file(OutFile),
  383: 
  384:     %% Start log and check that show is printed to log and not to standard_io
  385:     ok = rb:start_log(OutFile),
  386:     [] = capture(fun() -> rb:show(1) end),
  387:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(OutFile),
  388:     true = (Bin =/= <<>>),
  389: 
  390:     %% Start log with atom standard_io and check that show is printed to standard_io
  391:     ok = rb:stop_log(),
  392:     ok = file:write_file(OutFile,[]),
  393:     ok = rb:start_log(standard_io),
  394:     StdioResult = [_|_] = capture(fun() -> rb:show(1) end),
  395:     {ok,<<>>} = file:read_file(OutFile),
  396: 
  397:     %% Start log and check that show is printed to iodevice log and not to standard_io
  398:     ok = rb:stop_log(),
  399:     ok = file:write_file(OutFile,[]),
  400:     {ok, IoOutFile} = file:open(OutFile,[write]),
  401:     ok = rb:start_log(IoOutFile),
  402:     [] = capture(fun() -> rb:show(1) end),
  403:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(OutFile),
  404:     true = (Bin =/= <<>>),
  405:     ok = file:close(IoOutFile),
  406: 
  407:     %% Stop log and check that show is printed to standard_io and not to log
  408:     ok = rb:stop_log(),
  409:     ok = file:write_file(OutFile,[]),
  410:     StdioResult = capture(fun() -> rb:show(1) end),
  411:     {ok,<<>>} = file:read_file(OutFile),
  412: 
  413:     %% Start log and check that list is printed to log and not to standard_io
  414:     ok = file:write_file(OutFile,[]),
  415:     ok = rb:start_log(OutFile),
  416:     [] = capture(fun() -> rb:log_list() end),
  417:     {ok,Bin2} = file:read_file(OutFile),
  418:     true = (Bin2 =/= <<>>),
  419: 
  420:     %% Stop log and check that list is printed to standard_io and not to log
  421:     ok = rb:stop_log(),
  422:     ok = file:write_file(OutFile,[]),
  423:     StdioResult2 = capture(fun() -> rb:log_list() end),
  424:     {ok,<<>>} = file:read_file(OutFile),
  425:     
  426:     %% Test that standard_io is used if log file cannot be opened
  427:     ok = rb:start_log(filename:join(nonexistingdir,"newfile.txt")),
  428:     StdioResult = capture(fun() -> rb:show(1) end),
  429:     {ok,<<>>} = file:read_file(OutFile),
  430: 
  431:     ok.
  432: 
  433: 
  434: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  435: %%% INTERNAL FUNCTIONS
  436: 
  437: restart_sasl() ->
  438:     application:stop(sasl),
  439:     ok = application:start(sasl),
  440:     wait_for_sasl().
  441: 
  442: reset_sasl(Config) ->
  443:     application:unset_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_dir),
  444:     application:unset_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_maxbytes),
  445:     application:unset_env(sasl,error_logger_mf_maxfiles),
  446:     empty_error_logs(Config).
  447: 
  448: empty_error_logs(Config) ->
  449:     application:stop(sasl),
  450:     catch delete_content(?config(rb_dir, Config)),
  451:     ok = application:start(sasl),
  452:     wait_for_sasl().
  453: 
  454: wait_for_sasl() ->
  455:     wait_for_sasl(50).
  456: wait_for_sasl(0) ->
  457:     ct:fail("sasl application did not start within 5 seconds");
  458: wait_for_sasl(N) ->
  459:     case lists:keymember(sasl,1,application:which_applications()) of
  460: 	true ->
  461: 	    ok;
  462: 	false ->
  463: 	    timer:sleep(100),
  464: 	    wait_for_sasl(N-1)
  465:     end.
  466: 
  467: start_rb(OutFile) ->
  468:     do_start_rb([{start_log,OutFile}]).
  469: start_rb() ->
  470:     do_start_rb([]).
  471: 
  472: do_start_rb(Opts) ->
  473:     {ok,Pid} = rb:start(Opts),
  474: 
  475:     %% Wait for process to started, then wait a little bit more
  476:     sys:get_status(Pid),
  477:     timer:sleep(500),
  478: 
  479:     %% Make sure printouts (e.g. from rb:list(), come to the test log,
  480:     %% and that they can be captured.
  481:     group_leader(group_leader(),Pid),
  482:     ok.
  483: 
  484: 
  485: delete_tree(Dir) ->
  486:     case filelib:is_dir(Dir) of
  487: 	true ->
  488: 	    delete_content(Dir),
  489: 	    file:del_dir(Dir);
  490: 	false ->
  491: 	    ok = file:delete(Dir)
  492:     end.
  493: 
  494: delete_content(Dir) ->
  495:     {ok,Files} = file:list_dir(Dir),
  496:     lists:foreach(fun(File) -> delete_tree(filename:join(Dir,File)) end, 
  497: 		  Files).
  498: 
  499: init_error_logs() ->        
  500:     error_logger:error_report([{rb_SUITE,rb_test_error}]),
  501:     error_logger:error_msg("rb_test_error_msg"),
  502:     error_logger:info_report([{rb_SUITE,rb_test_info}]),
  503:     error_logger:info_msg("rb_test_info_msg"),
  504:     _Pid = start(),
  505:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process,?MODULE),
  506:     gen_server:cast(?MODULE,crash),
  507:     receive {'DOWN',Ref,process,_,{rb_SUITE,rb_test_crash}} -> ok
  508:     after 2000 ->
  509: 	    test_server:format("Got: ~p~n",[process_info(self(),messages)]),
  510: 	    ct:fail("rb_SUITE server never died")
  511:     end,
  512:     erlang:demonitor(Ref),
  513:     wait_for_server(),
  514:     ok.
  515: 
  516: wait_for_server() ->
  517:     case whereis(?MODULE) of
  518: 	undefined ->
  519: 	    wait_for_server();
  520: 	Pid ->
  521: 	    timer:sleep(100), % allow the supervisor report to be written
  522: 	    Pid
  523:     end.
  524: 
  525: capture(Fun) ->
  526:     test_server:capture_start(),
  527:     ok = Fun(),
  528:     timer:sleep(1000),
  529:     test_server:capture_stop(),
  530:     string:tokens(lists:append(test_server:capture_get()),"\n").
  531: 
  532: 
  533: rb_filter(Filter,OutFile) ->
  534:     check_report(fun() -> rb:filter(Filter) end, OutFile).
  535: rb_filter(Filter,Dates,OutFile) ->
  536:     check_report(fun() -> rb:filter(Filter,Dates) end, OutFile).
  537: 
  538: 
  539: %% This function first empties the given report file, then executes
  540: %% the fun and returns a list of {N,Report}, where Report is a report
  541: %% read from the file and N is an integer. The newest report has the
  542: %% lowest number.
  543: %% If the fun was a call to rb:show() (i.e. with no arguments), then
  544: %% the numbering (N) will be the same as rb's own numbering (as shown
  545: %% by rb:list()).
  546: check_report(Fun,File) ->
  547:     file:delete(File),
  548:     rb:rescan([{start_log,File}]),
  549:     ok = Fun(),
  550:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(File),
  551:     Reports = split_reports(binary_to_list(Bin),[],[]),
  552:     lists:zip(lists:seq(1,length(Reports)),Reports).
  553: 
  554: -define(report_header_line,"\n===============================================================================\n").
  555: split_reports([],Report,Reports) ->
  556:     add_report(Report,Reports);
  557: split_reports(Text,Report,Reports) ->
  558:     case Text of
  559: 	?report_header_line++Rest ->
  560: 	    {Heading,PrevReport} = lists:splitwith(fun($\n) -> false;
  561: 						      (_) -> true
  562: 						   end,
  563: 						   Report),
  564: 	    split_reports(Rest,
  565: 			  ?report_header_line++Heading,
  566: 			  add_report(PrevReport,Reports));
  567: 	[Ch|Rest] ->
  568: 	    split_reports(Rest,[Ch|Report],Reports)
  569:     end.
  570: 
  571: add_report(Report,Reports) ->    
  572:     case string:strip(Report,both,$\n) of
  573: 	[] -> Reports;
  574: 	Report1 -> [lists:reverse(Report1)|Reports]
  575:     end.
  576: 
  577: %% Returns true if Substr is a substring of Str.
  578: contains(Str,Substr) ->
  579:     0 =/= string:str(Str,Substr).
  580: 
  581: %% Sort the result of rb_list after report type
  582: sort_list(List) ->
  583:     sort_list(List,dict:new()).
  584: sort_list([H|T],D) ->
  585:     case re:run(H,"\s+[0-9]+\s+([a-z_]+)",[{capture,all_but_first,list}]) of
  586: 	nomatch ->
  587: 	    sort_list(T,D);
  588: 	{match,[TypeStr]} ->
  589: 	    sort_list(T,dict:append(list_to_atom(TypeStr),H,D))
  590:     end;
  591: sort_list([],D) ->
  592:     lists:sort(dict:to_list(D)).
  593: 
  594: 
  595: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  596: %%% A dummy supervisor and gen_server used for creating crash- and
  597: %%% supervisor reports
  598: start() ->
  599:     {ok,Pid} =
  600: 	supervisor:start_link({local, ?SUP}, ?MODULE, i_am_supervisor),
  601:     unlink(Pid),
  602:     Pid.
  603: start_server() ->
  604:     gen_server:start_link({local, ?MODULE}, ?MODULE, i_am_server, []).
  605: init(i_am_server) ->
  606:     {ok, state};
  607: init(i_am_supervisor) ->
  608:     AChild = {?SUP,{?MODULE,start_server,[]},
  609: 	      permanent,2000,worker,[?MODULE]},
  610:     {ok,{{one_for_all,1,1}, [AChild]}}.
  611: handle_call(_Request, _From, State) ->
  612:     Reply = ok,
  613:     {reply, Reply, State}.
  614: handle_cast(crash, State) ->
  615:     exit({rb_SUITE,rb_test_crash}),
  616:     {noreply, State}.
  617: handle_info(_Info, State) ->
  618:     {noreply, State}.
  619: terminate(_Reason, _State) ->
  620:     ok.
  621:
